Articles.Content:
Is there a way to add sounds to parts in the game ?

I've tried to add a wav sound under mod directory and used it in the .cfg file of the parts but it didn't work :/
That's a good question that I'd like answered as well. There's not a lot of info on this except [this post](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/25013?p=719252&viewfull=1#post719252).
